messages.subject: Shura no Toki licensed
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.envirosphere.com/ 2004-07-06 mentions that Shura no Toki has been licensed by Media Blasters Shura no Toki is another anime which features the
messages.messageBody:
http://www.envirosphere.com/
2004-07-06
mentions that Shura no Toki has been licensed by Media Blasters
Shura no Toki is another anime which features the Shinsengumi
(Okita)...I saw a music video of Shura no Toki and it has some
pretty good action which focuses on character technique...good stuff!
